Kovensoft is one of the leading recruiting companies in the country and is a leading global player serving large multinational and large business conglomerates. It is currently serving the companies for its manpower needs across India and international markets such as USA, Europe, the Far East and the Middle East

We keep a closer eye of the changing world, anticipate needs and seize opportunities and grow both as individuals and as a company. This enables us to stay ahead of competition and form a long-term and mutually rewarding partnership with our clients.

Kovensoft is one of the leading recruiting companies in the country and is a leading global player serving large multinational and large business conglomerates. It is currently serving the companies for its manpower needs across India and international markets such as USA, Europe, the Far East and the Middle East.

Since our inception in , we have developed intense capabilities in several functional and specialty segments and have emerged as a versatile Recruiting Consultants providing ultimate solution in Manpower.

Mobile Solutions:
Mobile Solutions

No matter what your mobile dreams are, Kovensoft can make them come true. We understand the complex usability issues that are involved in mobile sites and applications, as well as the need for a consistent brand across platforms. Our mobile solutions consultants can help you take your Mobile business. We can formulate and execute a cost-effective strategy for your mobile solution that includes compatibility between mobile browsers, devices and platforms, optimized usability and real-time integration with CMS, ERP, CRM, Payment Gateways or any kind of existing / new Backend System.
Network Solutions :
Network Solutions

As the data center environment expands, companies must find new ways to improve efficiency. To increase performance and improve the availability of data management networks, enterprises are migrating the overall system configuration from the traditional direct server-to-storage connection to a switched shared server-to-storage connection via fiber-optic cabling. Networks are the backbone of your business and periodic evaluation is critical to accommodate new applications and to keep pace with business requirements. In today's business environment, enabling your network to work with multiple communication channels is paramount. Green IT offers design, integration and management services for customers who require flexible, robust and resilient network infrastructures. Our end-to-end network integration solutions help customers with complex network upgrades and mergers, expansions, or new deployments involving routers, switches, Firewalls, servers, and other network equipment.\n

NET OPTIMIZATION SOLUTION
SCALABILITY
AVAILABILITY
SECURITY
PERFORMANCE

We offer customized outsourcing solutions beyond time and geographies to manage the HR operations of our clients. In this service support, our in-bound team assumes full human resource operations responsibilities of our clients, such as resume management, candidate selection, interview scheduling, boarding facilities, etc. The teams are deployed both on-site and off-site to manage the client recruitment needs based on their culture and structure. Being part of the industry, we understand the world and culture of our customers. This gives us an influence to support the recruitment and evaluation of the appropriate types of applications. Our commitment to building a sustainable workforce structure has made us build long-term relationships with our customers.

We also have a unique proposition model that is termed as "pay for success" model that proposes zero responsibility on the clients. Under this model, the client is not responsible for any fixed amount, but can only pay when a potential candidate joins the organization.

Companies today need to respond to changing market conditions with innovation and agility. Kovensoft Consulting Services provides integrated, end-to-end, integrated solutions and services to help your business transform with certainty.

Training and development is a vital part of human resource development. It is assuming an ever-important role as a result of the advancement of technology that has led to increased competition, increased expectations of customer quality and service and a subsequent need to reduce costs. It is also more important globally to prepare workers for new jobs. In the current wording, we will focus more on the emerging need for training and development, its implications for individuals and employers.
Enterprise Solutions

Enterprise solutions are software applications that enable people to access and manage real-time information and transaction processes throughout an organization. Our business solutions help our customers achieve high performance. Transaction Processing and Decision Support Systems form the backbone of Operations and Analysis. To maintain and enhance their competitive advantage to provide better value to customers, companies invest substantial capital and effort in creating these systems.
 
 According to research by analysts, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) is not being used as widely as it should be.
 
 From the point of view of a company, the key objective of making investments in packaged applications is to derive benefits and business advantages
